item.description:
This is a meetup event to meet and welcome members new and current who want to participate in upcoming projects and present ideas for new collaborations. This event will be fun, casual and informative. Bring your business cards and invite a friend. We will meet at Max Brenner and fun atmosphere infused with chocolate, perfect for igniting creative energy.

Parking is nearby and accessible to public transportation. Located near Copley on Boylston Street.

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Cocktails and creatives
